list.abs: Dayu extol murals , hou ji , Jia Christians Boyi version of the deeds of the people the benefit of the people to conquer nature and the ancient spirit of perseverance .壁画歌颂大禹、后稷、伯益教民稼稿、为民造福的事迹和古代人民征服大自然的坚韧不拔精神。
everyone extols his noble qualities .人人称颂他的崇高品德。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin extollere, from ex- 'out, upward' + tollere 'raise'

entry.def: If you extol something or someone, you praise them enthusiastically.

example.ex: Now experts are extolling the virtues of the humble potato...
example.tran: 现在专家们都在赞美其貌不扬的马铃薯的种种好处。

example.ex: They kept extolling my managerial skills.
example.tran: 他们不停地赞美我的管理技能。

auth_sentence.content: When I was at School, my Mistress did ever extol me above the rest.
auth_sentence.res_content: When I was at School, my Mistress did ever extol me above the rest.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When I was at School, my Mistress did ever extol me above the rest.

auth_sentence.content: You just don't get it. You seem to extol the exact opposite of of reality.
auth_sentence.res_content: You just don't get it. You seem to extol the exact opposite of of reality.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You just don't get it. You seem to extol the exact opposite of of reality.

auth_sentence.content: In this song, Devi and other women of the Barefoot Brigade extol the benefits of their solar cookers and lamps.
auth_sentence.res_content: In this song, Devi and other women of the Barefoot Brigade extol the benefits of their solar cookers and lamps.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In this song, Devi and other women of the Barefoot Brigade extol the benefits of their solar cookers and lamps.

sentences.en: He never stops extolling the virtues of the free market.
sentences.cn: 他不停地颂扬自由市场的种种好处。
